abstract: Retail advocates have complained that the deal does little to remedy the card companies’ most egregious practices.
snippet: Retail advocates have complained that the deal does little to remedy the card companies’ most egregious practices.
lead_paragraph: In July, The Times reported on the controversy surrounding a proposed settlement between merchants, on one side, and Visa, MasterCard and many of their issuing banks on the other. Now a majority of the named merchant plaintiffs in the suit have announced opposition to the settlement.

headline.main: Merchant Plaintiffs Line Up Against Credit Card Settlement
